timeline.message:
Add migration script to cleanup AD_ data

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/6632

Remove obsolete and unused `org.compiere.model.I_C_BankAccount` and a few other classes which aren't used either

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/6632

Add migration script to cleanup AD_ data

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/6632

Add migration script to cleanup AD_ data

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/6632
